days.name: days
days.description: The amount of days to delete messages for

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Filter and ban members based on various criterias

pattern.name: pattern
pattern.description: The pattern to match against the username

confusables.name: confusables
confusables.description: Enable confusables (Cleaning the username or filter out members without confusables)

choices.1: Only pattern (default) (Pattern will be resistant to confusables and zalgo)
choices.2: Only filter members (Filter out members without confusables in their username)

insensitive.name: insensitive
insensitive.description: The pattern should be case insensitive (default: true)

full_match.name: full_match
full_match.description: The pattern should only match the whole username (default: false)

zalgo.name: zalgo
zalgo.description: Filter out members without zalgo in their username

reason.description: The reason to ban the members
